attributes.additional_details: Insurance premiums are become increasingly extortionate and in some cases are costing more than the cars are actually worth. This is unfair and unjust, especially for new drivers wanting to get their first car. This could be a contributing factor as to the number of motor offences committed annually especially in relation to to insurance.
attributes.background: There should be a maximum insurance premium that can be charged for certain age group's ie. 18-20 year olds, on the most common and frequently insured cars.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793
